attachments.fallback: Marsha P. Johnson and the Stonewall riots
attachments.title: Marsha P. Johnson & the Stonewall uprising
attachments.text: Known as an outspoken advocate for gay rights, Johnson was one of the prominent figures in the vanguard of the Stonewall uprising in 1969.

fields.title: Why is this important?
fields.value: The Stonewall riots birthed the importance of LGBTQ pride, now celebrated in parades nation-wide.

fields.title: Her legacy continues...
fields.value: In 2014 President Barack Obama registered Stonewall Inn as a national landmark.
